CutSceneText.Text: It's been a while since we last visited this hunting ground. It was a good decision to come here, big brother.
That's nice, Rheal. But I'm not feeling too well, so I'll need to go back to the castle early.
You really must be ill! Normally we can't drag you away from the hunt.
My lord has been working hard lately, constantly battling the Krall. I'll accompany him to the castle, my lord.
You do that, Kallaine. then, big brother, with your leave I'll have some fun by myself today.
Yes... Don't overexert yourself, and return home early.
Hahaha, "don't overexert yourself"... Your acting is top-notch, my lord. But I don't think it will be enough to face the Trolls no matter how much he overexerts himself...?
Do not underestimate Rheal. Even a pack of drugged, berserk Trolls will not find Mikael, a soldier of the Tijerid Elysean Army, such easy prey.
And why do you think I also put something in the meals of Mikael and his men, my lord?
... You are a wily old fox, indeed. You always think of everything, don't you.
Hehe, I will take that as a compliment, my lord.
What is going on? What are these monstrous Trolls...!
